| description    = Dear Watcher,

I find myself in need of someone with your particular brand of talents. As our last business transaction went so grandly, I appreciate the opportunity to hire you again.

If you are interested, please convene with me in Dunnage.

To our fortunate proceedings, Captain Furrante
